channel.title: I did what..?!
channel.description:
Guess what!!
I joined the National Guard today, I leave for Basic Training after Highschool.
Then I start college after that! :D
Don't worry though, other then during basic and Advanced training I will keep moderating here!

item.title: I did what..?!
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:7, topic:318856”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=415315.msg3056516#msg3056516 date=1260504708]

Congratulations. I joined my senior year, which was last year… Graduated in May and went to basics for 3 months. .I’m in the Marines though… If you did any ROTC at all you will gain promotions faster, which means more cash… I can’t remember if the National Guard still offers a signing bonus after basics… But if they do, use the cash for college and you will gain a promotion off of it… I am a Lance Corporal. But I’m also in Law school. I take classes every morning.

Btw; do you know which base your going to?

No signing bonus for me

However, after graduating from college (and ROTC) I will be commissioned as a 2nd lieutenant in either the Active army or the Guard.

I have no idea which base I will be sent to yet

Try to get in to San Diego, California… They are light on punishment…
Also the signing bonus part sucks for the nat. guard… But you being a 2nd lieutenant will mean u can boss me around if u ever see me haha. But after this year of Law School I will be a first lieutenant… And a easy promotion to Captain after a half a year- a year of active duty. Which means being in Iraq or Afghanistan… I am hoping to get to Major, or Colonel before retiring.
[/quote]

My recruiter says that becoming a major should be a relatively easy goal to obtain. I hope he’s right ;D

What was your ASVAB score, mine was a 93![/quote]
Mine was 97. First time I took it, when I was a junior in High school it was a 86.

But I hope he is right too because then I can obtain my goal before I ever think about retiring. Imagine becoming a Brigadier General…

Read full topic
